text: @SadiqKhan It's been known since before you allowed the BLM protests about the BAME community being at higher risk, everybody listened apart from you. Your pure ignorance to this is down to you and your actions. Any 2nd COVID19 wave is down to you, the blood is on yours and protesters hands
